name: Just Balloon: Move or Lose edition 3
name_original: Just Balloon: Move or Lose edition 3
description:
Game Made in 72 hours by me [Zeu31] for Ludum Dare 42, theme: "Running out of space".

Description:

Help the little balloon stay safe in this hostile environment where everything can kill our hero. But be careful! Because you are running out of space and all you can do is move.

Instructions:

    - hold the Left Mouse Button to push the balloon away from the cursor
    - hold the Right Mouse Button to pull the balloon to the cursor

Controls:
- Mouse-only
